entry.title: Friday night: Periods of rain. Low minus 4.
entry.summary: Periods of rain ending this evening then cloudy. Wind west 30 km/h gusting to 60. Low minus 4. Wind chill minus 9 overnight. Forecast issued 7:06 PM EDT Friday 17 March 2023

entry.title: Saturday: Flurries at times heavy. High minus 1.
entry.summary: Flurries at times heavy. Local amount 2 cm. Wind southwest 30 km/h gusting to 50 becoming northwest 20 gusting to 40 in the afternoon. High minus 1. Wind chill near minus 10. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 7:06 PM EDT Friday 17 March 2023

entry.title: Saturday night: Flurries at times heavy. Low minus 11.
entry.summary: Flurries at times heavy ending near midnight then cloudy with 30 percent chance of flurries. Blowing snow in the evening. Local amount 2 cm. Wind west 30 km/h gusting to 50. Low minus 11. Wind chill minus 8 in the evening and minus 18 overnight. Forecast issued 7:06 PM EDT Friday 17 March 2023
